title: The Adventures of Buck Tetris Pony Rider (Part 2)

fragments.text: I'ma need some backstory on Buck Tetris.
Turok 2's animation is better than this
i remember bioware used to have weird stinkfaces even going back to dragon age origins
"600 years dead" is "deep water drowned" tier
Did I just miss the "my face is tired" line?
he's the result of eating paint as a child
thats a lot of thought put into that i just assumed alien rash
well yeah like the hair was his thing before no doubt
he wore that look since before highschool
It's like everybody here has the heart of the poet and the brain of somebody with high-functioning autism.
They want to form these beautiful sentences but just can't express it without sounding super awkward.
this is giving me examples what not to do when doing writing for my projects
this base will explod in 60 seconds
it's like ok here's what to not do ever
did you make a monstrosity with her too?
surprised Twitch's Chat System hasn't shit itself again for the 400th time today already
maybe this gets better later on
I wanna see a spaceship I wanna live in.
the default is a monstrosity? wow
With nice red sofas and wood and fake fireplaces.
altazimuth i'll make sure to pester you about it sometime
There's no damn wood in space.
i'm thinking a bookshelf, a tv, a canvas to do some painting on
Just some carpet in a room.
you try to medic everyone but sometimes you just got to say "they're dead jim" and move on to the next dying space man
I don't want carpet everywhere that's not practical, but I'd get super depressed in a totally cold metal ship.
After the wonder of being in spaaaaaaaaace wore off.
ah, the z-fighting express has arrived
I have not yet. It's on my long list of shit to watch.
the moonbase in it is a perfect example of "yeah i'd be tired of this place after 2 weeks"
I wonder if astronauts on the ISS suffer fron ennui.
The Clay on Pathfinder's Face is about crack.
@Altazimuth i dunno i could run for a fairly long time on the sense of "omg omg omg I'M IN SPACE"
but when anyone could go to space it'd be a lot less special
Da_Spadger Well there's plenty to do.
can I dunk biscuits in my coca cola?
But you'll run out of shit to do eventually.
oh sure in the project i have in mind there'll be shit to do but the spaceship would just be a place to stay
You'll get tired of spheres of liquid and floating about.
i'll make sure it's a nice play to stay
And the 2 hours exercise a day to try not to atrophy your muscles.
i'm glad that in the future even people that look like buck tetris can be protagonists
explain the "desire to knead his face" again
I'd like to know how he ended up with it
what did he look like as an infant
@Altazimuth i'm explaining that away with the following concepts: cryogenics and you're busy fighting demons anyway
that's a bit what i had in mind
He got stuck out on the surface of mars like in Total Recall
oh and the third concept i forgot to mention: cybernetically enhanced muscles dont atrophy
i imagine he had a birthmark that was a tangle of awful jagged tetris pieces and they tattoo'd the rest in to fix it
yo i dunno about you but i love the adventures of bucktetris "menu" ryder
What al ovely change of page.
@Altazimuth yeah it's in the concept folder for that reason
looks futuristic and still nice and lovely
(it's a doom level set where you occasionally return to the homeship)
I've come to talk to you agaaaaaaaaaain
nah the track of the moment is aphex twin - w32.mydoom.au@mm
hey alfonzo can you make some plutonia twid maps for me thx
I think the reverb is a bit too much here.
oh okay that's not the game skipping ahead
i need ripoffs of abyss and mortal coil though
tarnsman you should rip off hexsoil
would make for the best map
That transition screen reminds me of a fair few amount of Cut scenes from the DOS Adventure game, Cyberia
nukage steve doesn't have a chair. sewage steve doesn't need one either
oh my god it's z-fighting so hard lol
it's when two textures quickly flip back and forth because they're interfering with each other
z-fighting should not be happening in this current day an age.
it's the point of a man who can't properly wash his face in the morning
Altazimuth: https://twitter.com/joachimholmer/status/799602767081848832?lang=en and if it does, you can always do this
this is like that episode of ducktales where donald duck gets framed for espionage and the punishment is getting kicked out of the navy
i'm 75% i didnt imagine that episode anyway
I dunno if it's deserving of the full "swagger"
id say more of a "ger", CapnClever
Buck looks like he need to take a shit
hey now, gotta avoid being racist suite. wagga it is : v )
so, is this better or worse than ME2/3 so far Tarnsmandw?
avoid this like the plague. got it!
Avoid the entire series like the plague.
ME1 was alright, but I'll be damned if I'm ever playing 2 or 3 now. or this.
ME2 was alright too but that's what i started with
are you saying this game is a giant space opera Alfonzo?
there is a lot more combat coming
Mass Effect and the Techni-Coloured Ending Sequence
you know if this general level design and voice lines were in a doom map set it'd be quirky and charming instead of holy shit what is this
for a moment i thought buck looked human but then he fucked it up
hey I thought buck was supposed to be casual
i dunno Da_Spadger, I've heard better VA'ing in a few Doom things. like Adventures of Square.
sure but that could be called good
a shame you cant go into the black hole.
instead of "this is some silly shit but this is a doom wad so i guess it's quirky and charming"
and why is one of the areas almost named after the Dynasty Warriors character Zhang He?
so you're saying this VA'ing would be great in a Doom wad Da_Spadger?
if this was the VA in a doom mod instead of an AAA game then yes
Bioware are clearly in the wrong business.
they need to sign up for Doomworld and start making wads.
but if someone took this VA from this game put it in a doom wad it'd not fly
can you land on the planet?
"hey this is from that mass effect game"
"on one hand, this place doesn't look like a future type-M"
"on the other hand, I REALLY don't want to have to navigate the galaxy map again"
that sounds like someone is trying REALLY hard to fake a english accent
well she still came from earth
best essel track for me still remains Waiting, for now
need to relisten to her stuff
Is this the same voice actress who voiced Cait in Fallout 4?
it's the scar tissue, isn't it
WE HAVE FRIEND ZONE CONTACT! I REPEAT, FRIEND ZONE!
I'm a big fan of womp
no one can love that face
"its not you it's me wait it's your face"
now now CapnClever, thats not true. what about among the krogan?
if elephantitis was the only problem then he could fix it
isn't sam like in your head? why do you need a router
do you like hurting other people
but can you make him anime run?

nah nightmare funhouse is aesthetically pleasing
that line on her chin looks like drool
i'm blue daba dee daba da

uh is tarnsman streaming i don't rememver him having an english accent
he is dleghthikos, but the person speaking right now is Alfonzo.

hi alfonzo nice to meet ya

i dunno that seemed more successful than before
it merely grazed your voluminous girth
Source: My volumous expertise on women
you always have her little sister to try.
no wonder you arent in posession of game
Wait until you get to the sex scenes, tarns.
I'm gonna take you apart just like this ship Buck.
i expected her to be a lesbian
she looks a bit like Mercy from Overwatch
I just went back to the vod and took the screenshot
someone who likes flight sims, I reckon
"and then buck tetris ryder led his screw into a black hole, the end"
Well there's no point having a to-scale map.
Since you won't be able to see the damn planets.
it's not cool enough to be phobos
is it the volcano that tom petty shat in?
did you say go pound it

but i'm biased cause i love-hate that game

you go and zoom right in
you go and zoom right out
you go and zoom right in

as if you're personally watching this

well dark energy is currently unobservable directly
that doesn't mean it'll be the case centuries from now

name planets like tarnsman names doom maps
